title: if some amenity space is provided in the earlier permission, then the quantum of such amenity space
clause_text: if some amenity space is provided in the earlier permission, then the quantum of such amenity space in the revised permission :- shall be limited to the area provided in earlier permission.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: if some amenity space is provided in the earlier permission, then the quantum of such amenity space in the revised permission :-
